Title: Erratum to: New promotion patterns in Italian universities: Less seniority and more productivity? Data from ASN (Higher Education, (2017), 73, 2, (189-205), 10.1007/s10734-016-0008-x)
Abstract: © 2016, Springer Science+Business Media Dordrecht.Unfortunately, the author has missed to include the acknowledgement in the original publication of the article. The acknowledgment is provided here. Acknowledgments I would like to thank Professor Guy Neave for having helped me in an earlier stage of this work.
